properties.Name: /action:register-all
properties.Description: Bootstrap Actions Registry by scanning all command files and establishing META self-documentation system

properties.Name: /agent:activity-summary
properties.Description: **Purpose**: Generate comprehensive activity reports across agent work sessions to establish visibility into progress, identify bottlenecks, and drive measurable outcomes through data-driven insights.

properties.Name: /agent:log-activity
properties.Description: **Purpose**: Streamline agent work logging across all 3 tracking tiers (Notion, Markdown, JSON) to establish transparent activity tracking and enable seamless agent handoffs.

properties.Name: /agent:performance-report
properties.Description: Establish agent effectiveness measurement to drive performance optimization and inform delegation decisions through historical metrics analysis
